localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Still is designed to help you relieve symptoms of Anxiety and OCD. Using targeted messages to help pull your focus out of your anxiety or OCD as well as breathing exercises, Still helps you avoid the worst of your condition and stop it from taking hold.
blogPost.body: Still is designed to help you relieve symptoms of Anxiety and OCD. Using targeted messages to help pull your focus out of your anxiety or OCD as well as breathing exercises, Still helps you avoid the worst of your condition and stop it from taking hold.
blogPost.title: Still - An app to help relieve symptoms of anxiety & OCD
blogPost.author: Tom Norton

localize.description: Still旨在帮助你缓解焦虑和强迫症的症状。利用有针对性的信息帮助您将注意力从焦虑或强迫症中拉出来，以及呼吸练习，Still帮助您避免最糟糕的状况，并阻止它的发生。
localize.tagline: 一款帮助缓解焦虑和强迫症症状的应用程序。

localize.description: Still旨在幫助你緩解焦慮和強迫症的症狀。利用有針對性的信息幫助您將注意力從焦慮或強迫症中拉出來，以及呼吸練習，Still幫助您避免最糟糕的狀況，並阻止它的發生。
localize.tagline: 一款幫助緩解焦慮和強迫症症狀的應用程序。

previous.excerpt: Without Community, There Is No Crypto. LunarCRUSH is a social listening platform for cryptocurrencies and helps investors make better decisions by tracking the community each cryptocurrency is building through beautiful dashboards and real-time data analysis.
previous.title: LunarCRUSH - Social Listening for Cryptocurrencies

localize.description: 没有社区，就没有加密。LunarCRUSH是一个加密货币的社交聆听平台，通过精美的仪表盘和实时数据分析，跟踪每个加密货币正在建立的社区，帮助投资者做出更好的决策。
沒有社區，就沒有加密。LunarCRUSH是一個加密貨幣的社交聆聽平臺，通過精美的儀表盤和實時數據分析，跟蹤每個加密貨幣正在建立的社區，幫助投資者做出更好的決策。
